DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study measure clinical utility ( accuracy ) hand-held breast scanner ( iBE ) detection breast lesion lump . The iBE result compare result current mammogram and/or ultrasound . The duration study participation approximately 30 minute one day .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Utility Study Low-Cost Hand-Held Breast Scanner
DOC.detailed_description: The FDA approve class II device clinical trial low-cost hand-held breast scanner ( intelligent Breast Exam , iBE ) . This device use pre-screening tool mammogram ultrasound . Determination accuracy iBE detection clinically relevant breast lesion perform mean prospective study . The iBE evaluation perform trained licensed practical nurse ultrasound technologist blind outcome radiology study time iBE perform . The iBE training do lead iBE user United States . The iBE evaluation do prior patient 's original schedule imaging visit . After completion image visit radiologist evaluate mammogram and/or ultrasound image along iBE report .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old Women men symptomatic breast lump ( either palpation image ) OR Asymptomatic woman present image center screen mammogram Signed Informed Consent Patients 18 year age Patients previously participate study return Women 's Imaging Center followup diagnostic test
